verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--'mandira bhitare nā yāiba
garuḍera pāśe rahi' darśana kariba'

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya replied; mandira—the temple; bhitare—inside; nā—never; yāiba—I shall go; garuḍera—of the column known as the Garuḍa-stambha; pāśe—by the side; rahi'-staying; darśana—seeing; kariba—I shall do.
translation: The Lord said, "I shall never enter the temple but shall always view the Lord from the side of the Garuḍa-stambha."
